content.raw:
Oh, btw, this version can't run `segway --help command`. It throw the following error

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/users/xzeng/.local/bin/segway", line 9, in <module>
    load_entry_point('segway==1.2.3.dev0', 'console_scripts', 'segway')()
  File "/users/xzeng/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/segway-1.2.3.dev0-py2.7.egg/segway/run.py", line 2604, in main
    options, args = parse_options(args)
  File "/users/xzeng/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/segway-1.2.3.dev0-py2.7.egg/segway/run.py", line 2589, in parse_options
    options, args = parser.parse_args(args)
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 1400, in parse_args
    stop = self._process_args(largs, rargs, values)
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 1444, in _process_args
    self._process_short_opts(rargs, values)
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 1551, in _process_short_opts
    option.process(opt, value, values, self)
  File "build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/optplus/__init__.py", line 121, in process
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 789, in process
    self.action, self.dest, opt, value, values, parser)
  File "build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/optplus/__init__.py", line 143, in take_action
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 811, in take_action
    parser.print_help()
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 1670, in print_help
    file.write(self.format_help().encode(encoding, "replace"))
UnicodeDecodeError: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xe2 in position 4039: ordinal not in range(128)
```

I think it has to do with this line, `“floored”` here you use is \u201d, change to the regular `"floored"` (\u0022)
content.html:
Oh, btw, this version can't run segway --help command. It throw the following error

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/users/xzeng/.local/bin/segway", line 9, in <module>
    load_entry_point('segway==1.2.3.dev0', 'console_scripts', 'segway')()
  File "/users/xzeng/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/segway-1.2.3.dev0-py2.7.egg/segway/run.py", line 2604, in main
    options, args = parse_options(args)
  File "/users/xzeng/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/segway-1.2.3.dev0-py2.7.egg/segway/run.py", line 2589, in parse_options
    options, args = parser.parse_args(args)
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 1400, in parse_args
    stop = self._process_args(largs, rargs, values)
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 1444, in _process_args
    self._process_short_opts(rargs, values)
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 1551, in _process_short_opts
    option.process(opt, value, values, self)
  File "build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/optplus/__init__.py", line 121, in process
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 789, in process
    self.action, self.dest, opt, value, values, parser)
  File "build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/optplus/__init__.py", line 143, in take_action
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 811, in take_action
    parser.print_help()
  File "/scratch/opt/python-2.7.9/lib/python2.7/optparse.py", line 1670, in print_help
    file.write(self.format_help().encode(encoding, "replace"))
UnicodeDecodeError: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xe2 in position 4039: ordinal not in range(128)

I think it has to do with this line, “floored” here you use is \u201d, change to the regular "floored" (\u0022)
